          <title>
            <string language="et">Koduloomad - esitlus</string>
            <string language="en">Domestic Animal - presentation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haustier - Darstellung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animal domestique - présentation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animal doméstico - apresentação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animale domestico - presentazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατοικίδιο ζώο - παρουσίαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animal doméstico - presentación</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Õppematerjalid teema</string>
            <string language="en">Study material for topic “Domestic animals”. Suitable for form 2. Presentation (2 MB) introduces different farm animals. Students can tell about animals using the pictures.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Algõpetus</string>
            <string language="et">Loodusõpetus</string>
            <string language="et">Loomad</string>
            <string language="en">Basic School</string>
            <string language="en">Environmental Education</string>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studie Material für?Domestic Tiere des Themas?. 
Verwendbar für Formular 2. Darstellung (MB 2) führt 
unterschiedliche Bauernhoftiere ein. Kursteilnehmer können 
über Tiere mit den Abbildungen erklären.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matériel d'étude pour les animaux ?Domestic de 
sujet ?. Approprié à la forme 2. La présentation (mb 2)
présente différents animaux de ferme. Les étudiants peuvent 
dire au sujet des animaux en utilisant les images.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Material do estudo para animais?Domestic do 
tópico?. Apropriado para o formulário 2. A 
apresentação (MB 2) introduz animais de fazenda diferentes. Os
estudantes podem dizer sobre animais usando os retratos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materiale di studio per gli animali?Domestic di 
soggetto?. Adatto a forma 2. La presentazione (mb 2) 
introduce gli animali da fattoria differenti. Gli allievi 
possono dire a circa gli animali usando le immagini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υλικό μελέτης για τα ζώα θέματος ?Domestic;. 
Κατάλληλη για τη μορφή 2. η παρουσίαση (2 ΜΒ) εισάγει τα 
διαφορετικά ζώα αγροκτημάτων. Οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να πουν
για τα ζώα χρησιμοποιώντας τις εικόνες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Material del estudio para los animales?Domestic 
del asunto?. Conveniente para la forma 2. La presentación
(MB 2) introduce diversos animales del campo. Los estudiantes 
pueden hablar de animales usando los cuadros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Schule</string>
